segments.text: Good morning ! May I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Good morning ! Is Mr . Smith in ? I'm Cheng Jun from China National Petroleum Corporation . I'd like to see him .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you have an appointment with Mr . Smith ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Am . No , I have an urgency to talk with him .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Wait a moment , please . I'll tell his secretary that you are here .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm sorry . He is holding a meeting until ten o'clock .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's nine o'clock now . And I'll wait for him .
segments.speaker: S2
